feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had trapped Barney. Trapped him into marrying her. And divorce was so hard to get in Ontario. So expensive. And Barney was poor.

causedByEvent.name: Realizing the difficulty of getting a divorce and Barney's financial situation

feels.name: Pity
feels.quote: Valancy felt a pang of pity for him.

causedByEvent.name: Dr. Redfern's emotional recounting of Barney's past

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Suddenly she laughed in Dr. Redfernâ€™s face.

causedByEvent.name: Realizing the irony of the situation

feels.name: Insensibility
feels.quote: When you are bludgeoned on the head repeatedly, you naturally and mercifully become more or less insensible and stupid.
